channel.title: Just finished my website - Quixstop.com - Please tell me what you think!
channel.description:
I finally finished my site. It's all PHP. I have been learning some by now and turned my whole site from html to PHP. I was amazed at the huge difference! I now love PHP. :)
I am going to look for another forum as I can't customize mylittleforum's template.
I like the look and logo of my site, however I would like opinions.
Thank You!
btw, link: [url=http://www.quixstop.com]http://www.quixstop.com[/url]

item.title: Just finished my website - Quixstop.com - Please tell me what you think!
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

I like the logo.
I don’t really like the design.

And I just looked, there are no forums?

Read full topic

item.title: Just finished my website - Quixstop.com - Please tell me what you think!
item.dc:creator: @crazyhelper crazyhelper
item.description:
@crazyhelper wrote:

[quote=“nator123123, post:2, topic:182702”]ewww… feed forums.
ewww… ugly.
ewww… you didn’t put ‘style=“display:block”’ on the links.[/quote]
I run the link’s html from a text file and they simply take the .css stylesheet’s properties.

edit: I fixed the links

Read full topic
